name: Opensees for fire
body:
### About OpenSees at UoE
The OpenSees developers group based in the School of Engineering, University of Edinburgh first started in 2009. The aim of this work is to add a "structures in fire" modelling capability in OpenSees.

### Users
A number of wiki pages are provided to help users to carry out thermomechanical analyses with OpenSees using simple examples.

### Developers
A detailed description of all the new or modified classes developed for enabling thermomehcanical analyses in OpenSees.

### Publications
Links to publications by the group are provided here.

### Download
An executable version of OpenSees compiled for use in Windows can be downloaded and source codes developed can be browsed or downloaded. We'll update all the bug-fixing issues on that page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
